channel.title: Lifestyle on Post It!
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Post It!

item.title: Things that you can not do without
item.description: A little list of essential tools: git GitHub and GitHub Pages possibly with Nikola or Hugo Bitbucket Dropbox (possibly with git repos inside, see here for problems) Mega with linux sync ipython ipython Notebook with GitHub and nbviewer Inkscape Kate Go Veusz Keep JuiceSSH Docker, Rocket (see also why Rocket)
